id: Borrelia burgdorferi strain B31. This is the type strain (ATCC 35210) for this organism and was derived by limited dilutional cloning from the original Lyme-disease tick isolate derived by A. Barbour.

title: PRJNA4
column4: Treponema denticola ATCC 35405. Treponema denticola ATCC 35405 was isolated from a human periodontal pocket and is the type strain of this organism.
